title: [Cavern, Ledge]
description: You find yourself standing in a very shallow stream which dribbles over the edge of this chamber and down into a deep cavern.  The water originates from outside and a dim light filters in with it.
You find yourself standing in a very shallow stream which dribbles over the edge of this chamber and down into a deep cavern.  The water originates from outside and a bright light filters in with it.
